title: Blueprint, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom-Switch/Bellbox", September 13, 1937
markings: Stamp, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed at center left: SWITCH BOX/ INSTALLATION OF SWITCH & BELL BOX/REMOVE BACK OF NIGHT CABINET/FASTEN SWITCH BOX TO REMOVABLE/PANEL "A" AND PLACE BELL BOX/AS SHOWN ON OUR DRAW. NO./8589 - REV; inscribed below drawing at left: PHONE FASTENED/TO SLIDE FROM UNDERNEATH; lower right under stamp: SENT TO ANDERSON 9/13/37
description: Perspective drawing of night table with switch and bell box. Cabinet with rounded right corner; door on right side. Phone installed at left of cabinet below; phone fastened to slide. Switch box on left side above space for phone.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Harold S. Anderson House: Master Bedroom-Switch/Bellbox", September 13, 1937.
September 13, 1937. Blueprint on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-952.
